title: Susianjery22
author: Susianjery22
content: I was following this OwL site and OWLDAO gambling token but why they have locked their thread ? ðŸ¦‰ Owl.games ðŸ¦‰ Web 3.0 Crypto Casino & Sportsbook - BTC-Metamask-WalletconnectIs everything OK regarding their site and token?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Check their last reply on the thread, its mentioned their reasons. Locking the thread has lot of cons, there are at least 1 or 2 or more active scam accusations against them and these complainants nothing can do here since they only accept site's customer support regarding any issues.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: Susianjery22 on February 19, 2023, 05:56:51 AMI was following this OwL site and OWLDAO gambling token but why they have locked their thread ? ðŸ¦‰ Owl.games ðŸ¦‰ Web 3.0 Crypto Casino & Sportsbook - BTC-Metamask-WalletconnectIs everything OK regarding their site and token?Owl.games gambling site is up and running but i have no idea what is the current status of their gambling site withdrawal status etcHowever, they have locked their ANN thread as they have stated that they will provide support service on their website but then we have an open accusation against them.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439282.0Some people think that they have locked their thread as they do not want to be dragged into resolving this accusation, but things won't be better for them if they have an open accusation against them.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: regarding the Owl.games site and token it seems that it is still running well and there are still gamblers betting there. but I don't know about the deposit or withdrawal at this time is it okay. because at this time there are still unresolved accusations on Owl.games.and in my opinion it is very unfortunate when Owl.games is an old casino that has been around for a long time but when a problem like this has not been resolved it actually locks ANN threads, it is like risking reputation.maybe after there are accusations that have not been resolved it is possible that a new gambler will think again about gambling there because of course the fear is definitely there.but I do hope that the situation will improve soon and the accusations will be resolved soon so that Owl.games' reputation can recover again.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: Susianjery22 on February 19, 2023, 05:56:51 AMI was following this OwL site and OWLDAO gambling token but why they have locked their thread ? ðŸ¦‰ Owl.games ðŸ¦‰ Web 3.0 Crypto Casino & Sportsbook - BTC-Metamask-WalletconnectIs everything OK regarding their site and token?The owl.games online casino site continues to work, if you look at the site's traffic, more than half of the users are from Spain, the rest are mainly from North America, the average attendance is 30,000 per month. As for the OWL token, it is also alive, although the trades do not have such a large volume. That's what owl is.if they left the forum, then this should show their attitude to the community, or maybe they just considered it not productive.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Susianjery22 on February 19, 2023, 05:56:51 AM<snip> They left the forum. Their website and token are still up though. I was shocked by Owl's departure from Bitcointalk. To me, it is not a good move for them to leave the forum to limit the negative experiences that their players are encountering. It just shows that they do not want to be transparent. That alone is something that makes people doubt the service. I can't believe they turned out to be like this, I thought it was a good casino, I even joined their signature campaign before.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on February 19, 2023, 04:08:19 PMQuote from: Susianjery22 on February 19, 2023, 05:56:51 AM<snip> They left the forum. Their website and token are still up though. I was shocked by Owl's departure from Bitcointalk. To me, it is not a good move for them to leave the forum to limit the negative experiences that their players are encountering. It just shows that they do not want to be transparent...Or they are done with the hostile environment... For some people and businesses the forum has been a hostile environment, and that isn't a secret at all. People have to deal with cheaters who try to abuse their system and after getting their accounts locked they come here to start a scam accusation, some businesses are not up to dealing with that kind of trolls, and that's why some companies decide to leave the forum because for them it represents a bad experience.

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on February 19, 2023, 04:08:19 PMQuote from: Susianjery22 on February 19, 2023, 05:56:51 AM<snip> They left the forum. Their website and token are still up though. I was shocked by Owl's departure from Bitcointalk. That alone is something that makes people doubt the service. I can't believe they turned out to be like this, I thought it was a good casino, I even joined their signature campaign before.If they leave without solving the problem, the reputation their project has gained will be lost. I'm still not sure why the thread was kept off. But their exit from the forum will bring negative perception which will expose them to great losses in the future. I hope they temporarily turn it off for some reason or they come back again. If they have to develop their project then without this forum they will not be able to develop it easily.

Only if the claims have real merit otherwise they will be fine. We can not ignore some users make noise because they actually think the community will take their side (accusers).

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.created_time: February 19, 2023, 07:19:59 PMLast edit: February 19, 2023, 09:12:02 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Owl.games used to be one of my favorite casinos, but recently, I've began to doubt if everything is still cool with them, most especially, after they locked their thread, and some scam accusation began to spring up against them..I sold all my owl tokens which I've held for quite some time now and invested the money in another project I have full confidence in, and from now on, if at all I will still gamble on this Casino, I will do that carefully, else, I will just forget about them and choose other casinos on this from, since there are still several good online casinos here.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Not a scam accusation or anything, but I would avoid owlgames and its token for the meantime. Them locking their threads coupled with a lot of scam accusations is really concerning. It looks like they don't want to deal with those accusations here in the forum and are trying to isolate their support exclusively to their website. Well there isn't much of a problem to that if that's the route they wanted to take and are actually resolving those issues, but locking threads here means they don't want to get a lot more accusations against them that will destroy their reputation which is really, really fishy.

comments.author: usekevin
comments.body: Owl games already launched the signature campaign and the people are earning some dollars from it.And with my knowledge owl game is trusted one in forum.They had long running campaign and promotion was high in forum.I had checked the deposit and withdraw was not bad.The reputation was started in accusations and it should be resolved.If it was keep unsolved,it will be big problem for the owl game reputation.If the reputation gone,everything will be gone for sure.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Their official account is already tagged so I guess they're ready and aware of their shortcomings and when they locked the thread it proves further what their intentions are regarding their future promotions here in the forum.-As it stands, owl token have been unfounded and investors who might still hold their tokens are at loss in the current situation, and there is nothing that can be done about that.-Anyone that wants to risk playing on OWL casino should be careful going forward and only deposit a small amount.

comments.author: fullhdpixel
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on February 19, 2023, 04:08:19 PMQuote from: Susianjery22 on February 19, 2023, 05:56:51 AM<snip> They left the forum. Their website and token are still up though. I was shocked by Owl's departure from Bitcointalk. To me, it is not a good move for them to leave the forum to limit the negative experiences that their players are encountering. It just shows that they do not want to be transparent. That alone is something that makes people doubt the service. I can't believe they turned out to be like this, I thought it was a good casino, I even joined their signature campaign before.The reason they stated for leaving the forum is that they are re-arranging their strategies for better support services, though that could only be a cover up for something else, but at least they didn't disappear without saying anything.Also, if you check their social networks, especially Twitter, they are pretty active their with partnerships and marketing campaigns with multiple casinos and gaming platforms. That being said, I think if they didn't have bad intentions, even if they were accused, they could depend themselves by staying within the forum.
